description:
Job description
We are looking for a dental laboratory assistant to join our CAD/CAM department.
This is a permanent, full time job with 40 hours/ week

 1 to 3 year experience in CAD/CAM (computer assisted designing and manufacturing)
 Scan, design and mill crowns & implant abutments.
 Operate and maintain various dental milling machines and 3D printers
 Previous experience in plaster and model work is an asset
 computer skills and hardware troubleshooting.
 attention to details and good communication skills

We have a ton of on-site FREE parking
Paid vacation/ sick days/ personal days
Dental/ health benefits/ wellness program
Family like atmosphere
Please send your resume to ahmad@livedentalstudio.com
Job Type: Full-time
Salary: $27.00-$33.00 per hour
Benefits:

 Casual dress
 Dental care
 Extended health care
 On-site parking
 Paid time off
 Profit sharing

Flexible Language Requirement:

 French not required

Schedule:

 8 hour shift

Supplemental pay types:

 Bonus pay

Ability to commute/relocate:

 Kanata, ON: reliably commute or plan to relocate before starting work (preferred)

Education:

 Secondary School (preferred)

Experience:

 dental technician: 2 years (required)

Language:

 English (required)

Work Location: In person
